channel.title: Apple are idiots
channel.description:
Taken from the iTunes ELUA:
You also agree that you will not use these products for any purposes prohibited by United States law, including, without limitation, the development, design, manufacture or production of nuclear, missiles, or chemical or biological weapons.
How stupid can you get? Seriously guys...

item.title: Apple are idiots
item.dc:creator: @Itachi_Uchiha Itachi Uchiha
item.description:
@Itachi_Uchiha wrote:

What do you expect? Their first version was created in a garage.

[quote=“Casey., post:4, topic:146655”]Maybe they have some sort of nuclear substance in it. :rolleyes:

*Casey gets his ipod[/quote]73% pure potassium, 3% mentos, 10% of a warning label, 13% bones from the customer service working for Microsoft, and 1% a small chip that if touched, nothing will be effected.

[quote=“Pookey71, post:11, topic:146655”]Obviously, they could be used for necular warfare, how stupid are you?[/quote]Throw the iPod at the bomb and it goes boom lul

Read full topic

“If I want to manufacture biological weapons with my copy of iTunes, I will, fascists. Ditch this bullshit.” (http://www.thebestpageintheuniverse.net/c.cgi?u=macs_cant)

item.title: Apple are idiots
item.dc:creator: @pookey71 Pookey71
item.description:
@pookey71 wrote:

[quote=“Bobby, post:12, topic:146655”][quote author=zoltanman link=topic=200707.msg1783727#msg1783727 date=1190884098]

poeple in the us are idiots. common. faking putting a finger in chille? they should be banned. apple puts all thses disclaimers so know one can sue them unless they have a valid claim. ( thats not compeltely rediclulus) for isntance: my freinds dad is a lawyer and there ipod broke for no reason, so he sued apple and got a 400$ credit.

What you just said, is going against 300 million people. Of course, you and your awsome grammar, is (<—there) smarter then 300 million people. Also, people do really weird things with those devices. They just don’t want to be held responsible when somebody makes a violent weapon out of it.
[/quote]

exuse me, but the correct word is: are since you are refering to 2 things. owned?[/quote]
Do you have dyslexia?

Read full topic
